arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag praises 'big guy' Marcus Rashford after brace against Barnsley - as Man United boss enjoys 'perfect night' with 7-0 Carabao Cup win
arts.sum: United made light work of League One outfit Barnsley, with Alejandro Garnacho, Rashford and Christian Eriksen scored two apiece on top of Antony's spot-kick in a 7-0 thumping.

arts.ttl: Man Utd boss Erik ten Hag keeping his feet on the ground despite Barnsley rout
arts.sum: Alejandro Garnacho, Marcus Rashford and Christian Eriksen all scored braces.

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag reacts to Man Utd 7 Barnsley 0
arts.sum: Also individual players, Marcus Rashford wants to score goals and that is what I saw. “First of all, it’s most important that we defend well as a team and when we have that right aggressive attitude, then I know that those players will score goals.

arts.ttl: Man United thrash Barnsley 7-0 in Carabao Cup
arts.sum: Marcus Rashford, Alejandro Garnacho and Christian Eriksen all scored twice as Manchester United roared into the last 16 of the League Cup with a 7-0 rout of third-tier Barnsley on Tuesday.

arts.ttl: Manchester United run riot and set new record under Erik Ten Hag against Barnsley
arts.sum: It was comfortably Ten Hag’s largest win since taking charge in 2022

arts.ttl: Man United 7-0 Barnsley - Highlights, man of the match, stats from EFL Cup crushing
arts.sum: Manchester United make extremely light work of a defensively suspect Barnsley with a 7-0 thumping to progress to the EFL Cup fourth round.

arts.ttl: Marcus Rashford shines as Man Utd break Erik ten Hag record in Barnsley thrashing
arts.sum: MANCHESTER UNITED 7-0 BARNSLEY: Erik ten Hag recorded the biggest win of his Old Trafford tenure as the Red Devils marched into the last 16 of the Carabao Cup

arts.ttl: Highlights: Man Utd put seven past Barnsley in Ten Hag's biggest win at club
arts.sum: Highlights of the Carabao Cup third round tie between Manchester United and Barnsley.

arts.ttl: Manchester United 7-0 Barnsley: Marcus Rashford and Alejandro Garnacho shine in ruthless Carabao Cup rout
arts.sum: Christian Eriksen also nets a brace and Antony scores in the resurgent Red Devils’ biggest-ever victory under Erik ten Hag

arts.ttl: Manchester United run riot against Barnsley at Old Trafford
arts.sum: It was comfortably Ten Hag’s largest win since taking charge in 2022.
